name: Adfriendture
description:
Adfriendture

The big mean dragon said you're too weak to defeat him alone. 

Now it's up to you to fight off waves of slimes, gather a party of friends and challenge the dragon together.

Controls

MOVE - WASD / arrow keys (firing is automatic)

CONTINUE - Space

PAUSE - Escape

Select Next Party Member - Mouse
